Detailed Description

Implementation of the ISystemScene interface. See Interfaces\System.h for a definition of the class and its functions.

Member Function Documentation

void OGREGraphicsScene::Update ( f32  DeltaTime  )  [virtual]

This function must be called every frame. It updates the graphics scene.

Parameters:
DeltaTime Elapsed time since the last frame.
See also:
ISystemTask::Update

float OGREGraphicsScene::getTerrainHeightScene ( const float  a,
const float  b,
void *  userData 
)

Gets the height from the height map at the given a,b offset.

Parameters:
a const float - Horizontal offset into height map.
b const float - Vertical offset into height map.
userData void* - Pointer to user data used for the height lookup.
Returns:
float - Height for the give params in scene units.</returns
